channel.title: Data Science on Aniruddha Deb
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Aniruddha Deb

item.title: ISC 2020 Analysis: An application of Data Science and Statistics
item.description: The ISC Exam results were released on 10th June, 3 PM IST. In this article, I’ll be analyzing the results of the 117 students in the science stream of my school and showing how they performed. I’ll also weave a story with the data and point out things that could have been improved, which would be helpful for future students. ###Index: Elementary inferences: How have people fared overall? Frequency Distribution of Marks: How many people got the same marks in a subject?
